title: Coaching Update Around The League (Football 01/17)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Jason La Canfora update you on coaching hires and should-be hires from around the league. The guys discuss Mike Mularkey's ousting in Tennessee, Patriots coordinators heading elsewhere with Josh McDaniels presumptive hiring in Indy and Matt Patricia's in Detroit. Nick, Will and Jason also analyze Pat Shurmur heading to coach the Giants, what the Cardinals plan to do with their vacancy, while also sprinkling in a little convo about those creepy dog masks Eagles fans might wear to the game this weekend.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
